summary: Modern, elegant, mobile-friendly website for Marisol's Beauty Salon in San Fernando, CA. Features hero section, about us, services, online booking, gallery, reviews, and contact sections with rose gold/beige/white/black color palette.
architectural_notes: Single-page website design with smooth scrolling navigation
Rose gold, beige, white, and black color palette for feminine, premium aesthetic
Embedded Google Maps for salon location
Local SEO targeting San Fernando, CA area keywords
Fast-loading optimized images for gallery and hero sections
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern, elegant beauty salon interior with styling chairs, mirrors, and soft lighting in rose gold and beige tones (hero-salon-interior.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Professional hairstylist working on a client in a clean, modern salon setting (about-marisol.dim_800x600.png)
- Haircut and styling service icon with scissors and comb in rose gold color (service-haircut.dim_400x400.png)
- Hair coloring service icon with color palette and brush in rose gold color (service-coloring.dim_400x400.png)
- Hair treatment service icon with botanical elements in rose gold color (service-treatment.dim_400x400.png)
- Blow dry service icon with hair dryer in rose gold color (service-blowdry.dim_400x400.png)
- Beauty services icon with makeup brush and cosmetics in rose gold color (service-beauty.dim_400x400.png)
- Before and after hair transformation showing dramatic color change (gallery-transformation-1.dim_800x600.png)
- Before and after hair transformation showing volume and styling improvement (gallery-transformation-2.dim_800x600.png)
- Elegant salon interior with reception area and waiting lounge (gallery-interior-1.dim_800x600.png)
- Modern salon workspace with styling stations and professional lighting (gallery-interior-2.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a hero section with headline 'Enhancing Your Natural Beauty with Style & Care', subheadline 'Professional Hair & Beauty Services in San Fernando, CA', and two CTA buttons: 'Book Appointment' (scrolls to booking form) and 'Call Now â€“ (747) 279-8532' with click-to-call functionality (tel: link)

Create an About Us section that introduces Marisol as a skilled and experienced hairstylist dedicated to client satisfaction, highlights friendly service, professional techniques, and mentions the 4.6-star rating

Create a Services section with detailed service cards for: Haircut & Styling, Hair Coloring, Hair Treatments, Blow Dry, and Beauty Services. Each card should include a description and starting price placeholder

Implement an online booking form with fields for Full Name, Phone Number, Email, Select Service (dropdown with the five services), Preferred Date, Preferred Time, and a Submit button. Store booking submissions in the backend
Create a Gallery section with a modern grid layout displaying before & after transformations and interior salon images
Create a Reviews section displaying a 4.6-star Google rating and 3-5 client testimonials with star ratings

Create a Contact section displaying the address '11430 Laurel Canyon Blvd C, San Fernando, CA 91340', phone number '(747) 279-8532' with click-to-call functionality, an embedded Google Map for the address, and business hours

Apply a soft feminine color palette using rose gold, beige, white, and black accents consistently throughout the website. Design should feel clean, stylish, premium, and trustworthy with a welcoming salon atmosphere
Ensure the website is fully mobile responsive with fast loading times and optimized images
Render generated salon-related images (hero background, gallery images, service icons) as static assets stored in frontend/public/assets/generated

new_feature_requests.summary: Hero section with salon image, headline, subheadline, and CTA buttons (Book Appointment, Call Now with click-to-call)
About Us section introducing Marisol and highlighting salon reputation
Services section with detailed cards for Haircut & Styling, Hair Coloring, Hair Treatments, Blow Dry, and Beauty Services
Online booking form with name, phone, email, service selection, date/time, and submit button
Gallery with grid layout showing before/after transformations and salon interior images
Reviews section displaying 4.6-star Google rating and 3-5 client testimonials
Contact section with address, phone (click-to-call), embedded Google Map, and business hours
Mobile responsive design, fast loading, SSL secured, and local SEO optimization
